Button Variants

Button classes use the following naming convention:

All buttons

.btn

Standard (filled) buttons

.btn-{color}--{shade}

Outline (ghost) buttons

.btn-{color}--{shade}-outline

Sizes

.btn-lg | .btn-default | .btn-sm
Note: .btn-default is not required.

Disabled

Round Edges

Approved Background Colors

Classes use the following naming convention:

.bg-{color}--{shade}

.bg-neutral--300

Dolore do sint est ex esse cupidatat laboris est nisi duis do ullamco proident. Sint laborum sit laborum minim tempor eu incididunt nostrud duis id. Excepteur anim consectetur cupidatat cillum reprehenderit ex laboris sunt quis enim mollit. Voluptate non adipisicing incididunt nisi.

Recommended Colors

A blend of new and current colors. Will give enough variety to cover 99% of use cases

Neutral - 7 colors

neutral--900

body text, general ui

Hex: #191919
RGB: 25, 25, 25

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 17.58

neutral--700

placeholder text

Hex: #303030
RGB: 48, 48, 48

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 13.2

neutral--500

general ui

Hex: #5E5E5E
RGB: 94, 94, 94

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 6.48

neutral--400

general ui

Hex: #a4a7a9
RGB: 164, 167, 169

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 8.68

neutral--300

input borders, background

Hex: #dadddf
RGB: 218, 221, 223

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 15.39

neutral--200

general ui

Hex: #f3f3f3
RGB: 243, 243, 243

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 18.93

neutral--100

text, background, buttons, general ui

Hex: #FFFFFF
RGB: 255, 255, 255

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 21

Blue - 5 colors

Primary brand color.

blue--900

background

Hex: #00263F
RGB: 0, 38, 63

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 15.57

blue--800

background, links

Hex: #003399
RGB: 0, 51, 153

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 10.86

blue--700

menu, footer, button

Hex: #03559E
RGB: 3, 85, 158

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 7.51

blue--600

background, heading, icons

Hex: #007CC2
RGB: 0, 124, 194

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 4.5

blue--100

breadcrumb background, background

Hex: #edf4fa
RGB: 237, 244, 250

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 18.92

Orange - 3 colors

Secondary brand color.

orange--900

buttons, backgrounds, alert

Hex: #C45500
RGB: 196, 85, 0

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 4.52

orange--500

menu hover, borders

Hex: #f68a33
RGB: 246, 138, 51

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 8.6

orange--100

background

Hex: #fde1c1
RGB: 253, 225, 193

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 16.72

Purple - 2 colors

Tertiary brand color.

purple--500

background, button

Hex: #773064
RGB: 119, 48, 100

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 8.78

purple--100

background

Hex: #d7bfce
RGB: 215, 191, 206

Text when on bg: #000000
Contrast: 12.23

Green - 1 color

green--500

Only to be used as success states, if necessary

Hex: #038038
RGB: 3, 128, 56

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 5.06

Red - 1 color

red--500

validation error text, floating call to action button

Hex: #a71d1b
RGB: 167, 29, 27

Text when on bg: #ffffff
Contrast: 7.41
